name: Castle Amala
description:
Pick one of four adventurers to enter and explore the haunted Castle Amala. Go all 101 while being chased down by an unknown enemy. Can you make it out alive, or will you die trying to escape?

This game is based on the Third Kalpa from Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne where you get chased around by Dante. It also uses DMC and SMT music which will be changed if I work on this again which I really hope to do :)
